channel.title: Half Life SFM Series by PinWheel Arts
channel.description:
Hey everyone, i just found about this gem of a channel. One guy is making SFM movies within the Black Mesa, following the games story with amazing details and animation. Plus some new touches.
1st episode: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rnX3JwNoNgA']Half-Life: Anomalous Materials [SFM][/url]
2nd episode: [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J0LUHKuU1gQ']Half-Life: Unforeseen Consequences Part One [SFM][/url]
I think the animations is smooth, though a bit unfinished and rushed. But the story and added details are great!

item.title: Half Life SFM Series by PinWheel Arts
item.dc:creator: Centurion
item.description:
Watched the first episode with a smile on my face. Great little details as well, like Gordon fist bumping Eli. Great stuff!

Read full topic

Hey everyone, i just found about this gem of a channel.
One guy is making SFM movies within the Black Mesa, following the games story with amazing details and animation. Plus some new touches.

1st episode: Half-Life: Anomalous Materials [SFM]

I think the animations is smooth, though a bit unfinished and rushed.
But the story and added details are great!
